snippet: The move comes as a rival bidder, Exor, continues to press investors to vote against the Axis Capital deal.
abstract: DealBook Online; PartnerRe and Axis Capital Holdings announce agreement to sweeten terms of their merger after Exor pressed investors to vote against deal and accept its offer for PartnerRe.
lead_paragraph: The move comes as a rival bidder, Exor, continues to press investors to vote against the Axis Capital deal.

headline.main: PartnerRe and Axis Capital Unveil Sweetened Terms for Merger
